mapper.select: select seatType, seatContent from seat where seatType =#{seatType}
mapper.update: update seat set seatContent=#{seatTypeName} where seatType=#{seatType}
mapper.select: select seatReservenum, flightnum, seatType, seatNo, reserved from seatreserve where seatreservenum =#{seatReserveNum}
mapper.update: update seatreserve set flightnum=#{flightNum}, seatType=#{seatType}, seatNo=#{seatNo}, reserved=#{reserved} where seatReserveNum=#{seatReserveNum}
mapper.select: select peoplenum, peopleType, peopleSale from people where peoplenum =#{peopleNum}
mapper.update: update people set peopleType=#{peopleType}, peopleSale=#{peopleSale} where peoplenum=#{peopleNum}
mapper.select: select foodnum, foodType, foodName, foodImg, foodContent, foodIngredient, foodPrice from food where foodnum =#{foodNum}
mapper.update: update food set foodType=#{foodType}, foodName=#{foodName}, foodImg=#{foodImg}, foodContent=#{foodContent}, foodIngredient=#{foodIngredient}, foodPrice=#{foodPrice} where foodnum=#{foodNum}
